name: Blowfish
introduce: Blowfish is crypto firewall provider created to empower and protect Web3 users by identifying malicious transactions in real time. Blowfish built a simple to use API that helps wallets and custodians protect their users against all kinds of attacks (phishing, dApp-level DNS hijacking, software supply chain attacks, and more) and empower their users with real-time warnings and human-readable transaction context.
